items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater!
items.body: Love this sweater. It does sit on your natural waist, but I wouldn’t call it cropped. It is very comfortable and washes well. I would recommend. Read more
items.author: nicole reed

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Fit well, washes well, kept me warm! Read more
items.author: Honest reviews only

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not full length
items.body: Didn’t fit my body type, more cropped than full length so unless you have something super high waisted or are going for the cropped look I’d pass. Returned with no issues. Read more
items.author: Brittany Gozzi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Elegant Style
items.body: This sweater really impressed me with its overall quality. The knit fabric feels soft yet durable, with just the right amount of stretch for comfort. The stitching and finish are clean, giving it a polished look that stands out compared to many similar tops. The design is flattering, slim fit with a wrap detail that adds elegance without being overdone. It’s versatile enough to wear to the office, out for dinner, or layered casually for a weekend outing. I especially appreciate that it holds its shape after washing, which speaks to the quality of the material. Overall, this is a well-made piece that combines comfort, durability, and style. A great addition to any fall or winter wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft, and nice and thick. Really cute!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This wrap sweater is so nice! The sweater material is thick and really soft! It fits nicely with it being a bit adjustable with the wrap straps. It feels really good and I think it could be great for any casual or even nicer occasion. Read more
items.author: Christine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki Black, Plain Yellow, Plain Purple, Army Green, Hot Pink, Plain Burgundy, Coffee Brown, Light Blue, Plain Black, Plain White, Plain Grey, Dark Blue, Plain Khaki, Plain Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
